text: Hello guys, I want to create a custom ticket property of type dropdown, and want to fill its dropdown with data from my server's API, is it possible?
Yes It's refer to HubSpot API docs and use the tickets object to do it. Here is the link: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/tickets>
You would need to place the link of the image in the product property (hs_images) responsible for it and then that image will be populated in the UI Module of designer editor.

Hello <@U0558QCSRLP>,
Thanks for your guidance, But i already add image link into "Image Url" field but it didn't shows there.
